overview: A global documentary about the perils and pleasures of pastries - and the world hunger crisis.  "This film shows the relationship between calories, politics and powers. If you love food, you have to watch it."  - BronwynMauldin, "The Streetwise Cycle"  "Totally engaging." - Ben Lewin, Writer/Director, "The Sessions"  "A delicious indictment." - Ah-jeong Kim
tagline: Six years. Twelve nations. One film.
title: Let Them Eat Cake
